title: Cafe Turko
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Turkish restaurant in the Fremont area. Offers vegan and vegetarian items--from Turkish breakfast, appetizers, soups, salads to entrees and desserts. Menu is marked but you could also make requests. The owner teaches a vegan cooking classes at the local co-op, so she understands the vegan diet. Portions are large. Atmosphere is laid-back.
